snippet: Investors were disappointed Wednesday when Ben S. Bernanke, the Fed chairman, failed to hint that more stimulus was on the way.
abstract: Stocks fall after Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke fails to hint in comments that more stimulus is on the way, disappointing investors.
lead_paragraph: Investors were disappointed Wednesday when Ben S. Bernanke, the Fed chairman, failed to hint that more stimulus was on the way.

headline.main: Fed Chief’s Remarks Stop a Winning Streak
headline.print_headline: Fed Chief’s Remarks Stop a Winning Streak
